title: Engineering low-coordination atoms on RhPt bimetallene for 12-electron ethanol electrooxidation
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,2219-2227
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04023B, Paper
Bin Sun, Wei Zhong, Xuan Ai, Chong Zhang, Fu-Min Li, Yu Chen
The three-dimensional perforated RhPt bimetallene achieves a high exposure ratio of low-coordinated RhPt diatomic sites, demonstrating excellent activity and remarkable selectivity for 12-electron ethanol oxidation to CO2.
